mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentSchedule (studentScheduleNum, subject, color, startDate, endDate, startTime, endTime, repeat, repeat_cycle, memo, reg_date, teacherId, studentId, categoryId) VALUES (studentSchedule_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{color}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{repeat}, #{repeat_cycle}, #{memo}, SYSDATE, #{teacherId}, #{studentId}, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE studentSchedule SET subject = #{subject}, color = #{color}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, startTime = #{startTime}, endTime = #{endTime}, repeat = #{repeat}, repeat_cycle = #{repeat_cycle}, memo = #{memo}, teacherId = #{teacherId}, studentId = #{studentId}, categoryId = #{categoryId} WHERE studentScheduleNum = #{studentScheduleNum}
mapper.select: SELECT studentScheduleNum, subject, color, startDate, endDate, startTime, endTime, repeat, repeat_cycle, memo, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, teacherId, studentId, categoryId FROM studentSchedule WHERE studentScheduleNum = #{studentScheduleNum}
